name: com.projectdawn.cozy-builder

samples.description: This sample contains a small, stylized medieval village environment.
This sample contains the finished scene from the tutorial.
This sample includes the finished scene from the tutorial.

description: This package provides a lightweight solution for procedurally generating buildings. It is heavily inspired by *Tiny Glade*, featuring similar functionality and art style. Cozy Builder is designed as a tool for cozy builder games or a convenient solution for creating pre-baked buildings.
